functions.tag: {CustomModelData:1002,display:{Name:'{"translate":"日向喰らいの杖","color":"#FF8A4A","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"❖ ","color":"light_purple","italic":false},{"translate":"%1$s%2$s(II)","color":"white","with":[{"translate":"精霊の"},{"translate":"刻印"}]}]','{"translate":"日差しが強い場所に釣られた","color":"#FFF2A4","italic":false}','{"translate":"哀れな探索者を喰らう","color":"#FFF2A4","italic":false}','{"translate":"凶悪なモンスターを象った杖。","color":"#FFF2A4","italic":false}','[{"text":"","color":"white","italic":false},{"text":"W","font":"icon","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" フラワーギフトⅡ"}]','{"text":"---TUSBMemory---","obfuscated":true,"color":"gray","italic":false}']},Engraving:{EnchantID:"精霊",Tier:2},Skill:{Type:"TUSBMemory",Initializing:1b,Job:"白魔導士",SkillID:433,Name:"フラワーギフト",Level:2,Interval:4,Trigger:"手に持って右クリック",Count:16},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Name:"カスタム",Amount:20d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,10],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.4d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,21],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-0.3d,Operation:2,UUID:[I;11,0,0,32],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-2.4d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,50],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:4,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,40],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
